properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}According to Thy gracious word, In meek humility, This will I do, my dying Lord, I will remember Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gethsemane can I forget? Or there Thy conflict see, Thine agony and bloody sweat, And not remember Thee?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When to the cross I turn mine eyes And rest on Calvary, O Lamb of God, my sacrifice, I must remember Thee-{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And when these failing lips grow dumb And mind and memory flee, When Thou shalt in Thy kingdom come, Jesus, remember me.{/lang-eng}
